sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le hall de l'hôtel est très luxueux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The hotel lobby is very luxurious.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请注意使用正确的标点符号。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zhùyì shǐyòng zhèngquè de biāodiǎn fúhào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez faire attention à utiliser la ponctuation correcte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please pay attention to using correct punctuation.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a battu le record du monde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He broke the world record.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'eau de pluie a nourri la terre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The rainwater nourished the land.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ma tante paternelle habite à Shanghai.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My aunt lives in Shanghai.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèngfǔ xiūjiàn le xīn de gōnglù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le gouvernement a construit une nouvelle autoroute.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The government built a new highway.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce tissu est très doux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This fabric is very soft.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Edison a inventé l'ampoule électrique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Edison invented the electric light.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps est beau aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Today's weather is very nice.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois en faire l'expérience par toi-même.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You need to experience it yourself.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une forêt vierge.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a primitive forest.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 孩子们在果园里摘苹果。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Háizimen zài guǒyuán lǐ zhāi píngguǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants cueillent des pommes dans le verger.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The children are picking apples in the orchard.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yuánxiān zhèlǐ shì yī piàn nóngtián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Autrefois, c'était un champ agricole.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Originally, this was farmland.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiāofángyuán jiù le bèi kùn de rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les pompiers ont sauvé les personnes piégées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The firefighters rescued the trapped people.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'économie a ses propres cycles.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The economy has its own cycles.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'université a commencé le recrutement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The university has started enrollment.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zàicì gǎnxiè nǐ de bāngzhù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je te remercie encore une fois pour ton aide.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I thank you once again for your help.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen qù yī gè xiǎo dǎo dùjià.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous partons en vacances sur une petite île.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We are going to a small island for vacation.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il se tient debout parmi la foule.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is standing among the crowd.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 水有三种形态：固态、液态和气态。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shuǐ yǒu sān zhǒng xíngtài: gùtài, yètài hé qìtài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'eau a trois états : solide, liquide et gazeux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Water has three states: solid, liquid, and gas.
